snippet.title: HellroadVR  - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1389610
https://hellroad-vr.com/

A VR motorbike ride through a post apocalyptic wasteland swarming with all kinds of zombies. Speed is the only thing that keeps you alive. Turn your bike into a metal beast with spikes and howling chainsaws to carve your way through!
